script:
;;,二面性だね 大
;;,使い方次第だね 中
;;,僕の心の火薬にも火がついた 小
# script "lisp"
# fadein "black" 0.5
# background "sea_fireworks"
# bgmfile "bgm256" "BgmSeaDate" 0
# body %(unit_a)s
# pos %(unit_a)s 3
# mask %(unit_a)s off
# chara %(unit_a)s
# textflame 0 0
@
マスターは
雑賀を誘って
花火大会にやってきた

# textflame 1 1
@雑賀
戦おなじみの銃も…
あの花火も…

# voice 5024 "saika_0013"
@雑賀
同じ火薬を使ってるんすよねぇ

# select "二面性だね" "select_label_01" "使い方次第だね" "select_label_02" "僕の心の火薬にも火がついた" "select_label_03"
同じ火薬を使ってるんすよねぇ

# label "select_label_01"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_02"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_03"
# labeljump "select_label_end"
# textwindow "close"
# textflame 1 1
# waitandnext 0.1

# label "select_label_end"
# waitandnext 2
# fadeout "black" 1.2
